name: as
description: The element type to render as.

name: color
description: The color scheme of the sheet.

name: focusWithin
description:
Use focus-within instead of focus for containers with focusable children.
Only works when interactive is true.

name: interactive
description:
Whether the sheet is interactive (adds focus ring styling).
Use for clickable cards, buttons, or any focusable element.

name: size
description: The size of the sheet for context propagation to children.

name: variant
description: The visual style of the sheet.
